评论概述: Flirty, Stylish, and Perfect for a Night Out!
评论详情: Yes, yes, yes, this dress is everything! The cap sleeves and mock neck give it a chic and elegant touch, while the A-line flare makes it fun and flirty. It’s the perfect combination of classy and sexy, making it ideal for date night or a night out with friends. The fit is flattering, and the material is comfortable enough to wear all evening. I felt so confident wearing this, and I’ve already gotten so many compliments. This dress is a must-have for anyone who wants to turn heads in style!
Fits perfect and makes me look slim!

This dress is gorgeous in person. I got the navy and it is pretty and sexy without being trashy. The flare is sweet and the pocket detail is cute too. The fit is ideal and very flattering, and the stretch will have it hugging your curves. It is on the short side so it is not a church or office appropriate dress but would be pretty for girls night or a date!!

This dress was absolutely beautiful and I am so happy I purchased it for my graduation photoshoot! It’s so elegant without the crazy price of a high end brand dress. Great quality too, not see through. 10/10 recommend!

This dress is marketed as sexy but I find it to be conservative with it's high neck. The fit is like a glove and true to size. I could wear this to the office or as advertised to the club. The fabric is substantial so no seeing through it. I am petite and find the length perfect so the taller person might find it a tad "mini". I love this dress and I highly recommend it!

This is a cute cap sleeve dress. It has kinda a "sporty meets old money" vibe IMO. It looks nice on, classy, clean, and polished. The material is nice quality yet lightweight, has a light silky feel to it and is also a little stretchy. The dress is comfortable, a nice length - the hemline is a little above my knees (I'm 5' 4.5" and 120 pounds) and the small fits me perfectly. The dress has two faux pocket flaps in front that add extra style but can't be opened. This dress is versatile as it can be paired with heels/jewelry or a sweater/cardigan for a dressier look, or it could be dressed down with cute sneakers and a baseball cap for sporty or everyday, casual look. Either way this is a nice basic dress that would be a good addition to any wardrobe.

It is a bit too short for me. It is super flattering but I would have liked it to go maybe 1-2 inches longer. I plan on keeping it and using it with sneakers. The cut is just too cute to not wear it. It could be good for things like golfing where you could wear exercise shorts too.
Cute dress , great quality. Nice material
The dress would be very flattering if the material were different and not as stretchy, especially around the waist. The pockets make the dress sag around the waist.

This dress is nicely designed. The fit around the bust is nice. The cap sleeves are not sewn, but essentially an extended shoulder length. The dress is unlined. And the pockets are only decorative. The fabric is nice, smooth, vibrant.

评论概述: Incredibly Comfortable A-Line Dress That's True to Sizing and Form
评论详情: The dress has a breathable material that is form fitting without being overly restrictive. The sizing is true to form, which I appreciate as I have a petite frame.  The pockets on the front of the dress added visual appeal without being obtrusive, or sticking out so far from the form of the dress that the result looked sloppy.  The sleeves on the dress were cut to have more fabric over my shoulders than a tank-top styled dress, but were short enough to allow me to wear a shawl as needed in cooler environments (such as my office) without becoming too warm.  The dress had an accurate A-Line flare that didn't become distorted after several washing/drying cycles.

I’m absolutely in love with the Oten Women’s Sexy Cap Sleeve Mock Neck Mini Dress! The cap sleeves add a touch of elegance, while the mock neck gives it a chic and sophisticated look. The A-line flare is incredibly flattering, creating a beautiful silhouette that’s both feminine and comfortable.

评论概述: Cap Sleeve Mock Neck Mini Dress
评论详情: Perfect length for petite ladies. The fabric is very stretchy and feels light, almost like athletic/performance fabric. The faux pocket flaps makes the dress look a bit casual.

This dress is so pretty. I was a bit worried it wouldn't fit as I'm currently 12 weeks postpartum and still haven't lost all of the baby weight. I'm currently in a dress size 14 - 16 and the XL fits comfortably. It has a short of 1960's look. The color is beautifully vibrant and also lends itself to the 1960s aesthetic.

I’m 5’9 and this dress was beautiful and fit great BUT because I have a longer torso, it falls shorter, above mid thigh. It has a slit in the back so when I bent forward trying it on, my goodies could be seen from the back.
